KnowledgeGuru is packed with features

Custom knowledge base blocks

Please note: This is a knowledge base article example created to help you familiarize yourself with what KnowledgeGuru can offer.

KnowledgeGuru is packed with features

We've carefully analyzed the needs of the knowledge base website owners and created KnowledgeGuru to be powerful, fast, and as simple to use as possible.

Custom knowledge base blocks

Utilizing the power of the new WordPress editor, we've created custom blocks that will help you build your knowledge base website in minutes:

  • Search box
  • Contact box
  • Knowledge base categories
    • Icon cards
    • Image cards
    • List cards
  • Frequently asked questions

Live ajax search

Help your visitors find what they are looking for in an instance with this powerful feature. Live search results will appear as keywords are entered in the search form. Go on, give it a try below:

How can we help?

Extensive styling options

With KnowledgeGuru you have a wide range of styling options to customize the look and feel of your knowledge base website. Whatever your brand is - clean, corporate, fun, minimalistic - we've got you covered.

Customize everything from colors and fonts to the look of your website elements and blocks. There are three looks to choose from - sharp, rounded corners, and pill.

Made by a team of professionals

  • Title of power elite author on Theme Forest
  • Over 37.000 satisfied customers around the world
  • All of our themes are rated with a five-star rating
  • Our support team is one of the best-rated on the marketplace.

Icon cards examples

What can I use it for?

Use this block to display your knowledge base categories with icons in a card layout. Categories are added through the Knowledge Base section in the WordPress admin dashboard.

What options do I have?

The Icon cards block has five layouts to choose from, and various options to show and hide elements. You have an option to pick and reorder the categories as well.

item.title: Blocks example page
item.dc:creator: meks1
item.content:encoded:
This page is an example of what you can accomplish with the new WordPress editor. We've made sure that all of the blocks match the style of our theme - you can see a full style guide on these pages:

  • Common blocks
  • Formatting blocks
  • Layout blocks.

Start with a title

And keep writing your stories with the paragraph block. The paragraph block has all the usual formatting options you know from the classic editor, as well as some cool new features - font size and color, as well as drop cap.

Add more content

You can easily add content such as the gallery above. The new WordPress editor comes power packed with a range of available blocks for all sorts of content:

  • images
  • video and audio
  • quotes and pullquotes
  • tables, columns and buttons
  • etc.

Additionally, each block has different styles and variations to choose from - the above gallery is set to a wide alignment, for instance. This creates a nice effect since the gallery is now wider that the surrounding text.

Next, we'll add a cover image to spice things up:

A cover image with a fixed background.
Nice!

Play around with typography

Moving on, let's see how a quote block looks like. Quotes come in two variations - regular and large. Additionally, you can add pull-quotes as well - these come in two variations as well - regular and solid. You can even align the pull-quotes left, right, wide or full-width, just as you would an image block.

"Quote blocks are quite useful if you want to make a part of your text pop!"

- Meks team

This concludes the example page. You've seen just a fraction of what can be achieved with blocks. Again, for a full style guide please visit these pages:

  • Common blocks
  • Formatting blocks
  • Layout blocks.

item.title: Image cards
item.dc:creator: meks1
item.content:encoded:
Image cards examples

What can I use it for?

Use this block to display your knowledge base categories with images in a card layout. Categories are added through the Knowledge Base section in the WordPress admin dashboard.

What options do I have?

The Image cards block has five layouts to choose from, and various options to show and hide elements. You have an option to pick and reorder the categories as well.

item.title: Search box
item.dc:creator: meks1
item.content:encoded:
Search box examples

What can I use it for?

Use this block to offer your visitors an easy way to find information on your knowledge base website. There are three search form variations to choose from - small, big and boxed - and you can display an image alongside the search form.

What options do I have?

You can set the height, use a background image or video, and change the color of the search box to any solid color or gradient. You can add a Quick links menu below the search form as well. See below for some of the examples.

How can we help?

How can we help?

How can we help?

How can we help?

How can we help?

item.title: Contact box
item.dc:creator: meks1
item.content:encoded:
Contact box examples

What can I use it for?

Use this block to offer your visitors an easy way to reach your support team, or customize it to your specific needs. There are two layout variations - horizontal and vertical - and you can display an icon or image alongside the title and description text.

What options do I have?

You can set it to display in full width, use a background image or video, and change the color of the contact box to any solid color or gradient. See below for some of the examples of a wide range of possible styling combinations.

Still need support?

Don’t hesitate to get in touch with our support team. Send us an email and we will respond as soon as possible.
